attributes.action: Enact the Emergency Plan on Covid19 set out by Independent SAGE.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to adopt the Emergency Plan set out by Independent SAGE. This seeks to lower covid cases & buy time through a short circuit breaker while effective institutional "scaffolding" is erected over 4-6 weeks, with NHS England in charge, to oversee effective, localised track & trace. Other measures are proposed to ensure public safety with details freely available on Independent SAGE website. Only by effectively containing the virus can the economy & normality recover.
attributes.background: Management of Covid in the UK is failing, damaging health & economy. The Independent SAGE group of top experts urgently advised cracking down on Covid over summer. They were ignored but rapidly rising cases prove them right again. Government must listen to these experts & adopt their Emergency Plan.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, from 5 November to 2 December: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Start a second lockdown including closing schools to prevent spread of COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736
